title: RAGNAROK ONLINE IS ON STEAM!?!?!
body:
WHEN DID THIS HAPPEN!?!?! AND ORIGINAL EXP AND DROP RATES!!! WHAAAA

Time to get sucked back into the anime world, sorry everyone, it was good knowing you, I am soon going to be unrecognizable and many of you will scoff at me in disgust, but... I enjoyed that game so much ;( I am so happy right now.
